title: Event Management Web Application
discription: The Event Management Web Application is a MERN stack project developed for creating, managing, and participating in events. It is built using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, with a focus on delivering a responsive and user-friendly interface.

title: Personal Portfolio
discription: A showcase of my projects, skills, and professional experience as a web developer.

title: Surbhi Mobile and Accessories
discription: This is an Ecommerce platform where mobile accessories are bought and sold. Built using a WordPress template with PHP, HTML, and CSS.

title: Diamond Price Prediction
discription: The Diamond Price Prediction project uses machine learning algorithms to predict the price of diamonds based on various factors such as carat, cut, color, and clarity. The model is trained on historical diamond price data to provide accurate price predictions. Built using Python and machine learning libraries, this project showcases the use of regression techniques to estimate diamond prices, making it a valuable tool for both buyers and sellers in the diamond market.

title: Carpool App
discription: The Carpool App is an Android application that allows users to find and offer rides for shared transportation. Developed using Firebase for real-time data storage and user authentication, the app provides a seamless experience for users to create ride offers, search for available carpool rides, and connect with other users. With features like real-time notifications and ride tracking, it helps reduce transportation costs and environmental impact while promoting efficient and eco-friendly commuting.
